speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Imagine Pericles arrived at Tyre,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Welcomed and settled to his own desire.

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: His woeful queen we leave at Ephesus,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Unto Diana there a votaress.

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Now to Marina bend your mind,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Whom our fast-growing scene must find

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: At Tarsus, and by Cleon train'd

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: In music, letters; who hath gain'd

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Of education all the grace,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Which makes her both the heart and place

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Of general wonder. But, alack,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: That monster envy, oft the wrack

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Of earned praise, Marina's life

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Seeks to take off by treason's knife.

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: And in this kind hath our Cleon

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: One daughter, and a wench full grown,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Even ripe for marriage-rite; this maid

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Hight Philoten: and it is said

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: For certain in our story, she

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Would ever with Marina be:

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Be't when she weaved the sleided silk

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: With fingers long, small, white as milk;

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Or when she would with sharp needle wound

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: The cambric, which she made more sound

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: By hurting it; or when to the lute

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: She sung, and made the night-bird mute,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: That still records with moan; or when

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: She would with rich and constant pen

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Vail to her mistress Dian; still

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: This Philoten contends in skill

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: With absolute Marina: so

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: With the dove of Paphos might the crow

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Vie feathers white. Marina gets

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: All praises, which are paid as debts,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: And not as given. This so darks

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: In Philoten all graceful marks,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: That Cleon's wife, with envy rare,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: A present murderer does prepare

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: For good Marina, that her daughter

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Might stand peerless by this slaughter.

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: The sooner her vile thoughts to stead,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Lychorida, our nurse, is dead:

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: And cursed Dionyza hath

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: The pregnant instrument of wrath

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Prest for this blow. The unborn event

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: I do commend to your content:

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Only I carry winged time

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Post on the lame feet of my rhyme;

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Which never could I so convey,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Unless your thoughts went on my way.

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Dionyza does appear,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: With Leonine, a murderer.

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Exit

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: SCENE V. Mytilene. A street before the brothel.

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Enter, from the brothel, two Gentlemen
